name: Héstia
description:
"A story about the world? Yes yes, we know one"
This is how the journey of the artists to show their vision about the Greek gods and their forms begins.
Hestia is the fire itself, of purification, of creativity. I was thinking about this protective force while creating this piece.
Physical painting: acrylic and oil on canvas, 60x70cm, Ventania, 2021. 
#cryptoamigues #CryptOlimpianos
